review: Setup was flawless! I was mostly concerned about our slow internet connection (1.1mbps download/.93mbps upload w/49ms latency), but it's buffering has been minimally invasive on movies and music. On movies, it will buffer approx 5-7 times early on, but catches up and is constant for the rest of the video. Buffered somewhat when launching music but streamed fine even while downloading pix to Amazon Cloud via their app.As a tip, I turned off all of our networked devices to ease up more bandwidth. I believe this helped.Very simple setup, yet many features to play with. So far I am extremely satisfied!Now I have to find out how to get my Yamaha 5.1 stereo to work with it.Using a Samsung UN46D6050 TV
